name: d3-jnd
description: Just-noticeable differences for colors in CEILAB color space
author: Connor Gramazio (http://gramaz.io)

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -g d3-color:d3 -n d3 -o build/d3-jnd.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-jnd.js -c -m -o build/d3-jnd.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/d3-jnd.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-jnd.js build/d3-jnd.min.js
